login.title: Login required
login.description: You need to be logged in to benefit from this service. If you are not registered, the process only takes a few minutes.
login.smartpassText: SmartPass is your digital credential to access UAE government services
login.uaepassText: UAE Pass is the National Digital Identity solution for the UAE
departmentOfEconomicDevelopment.address: Baniyas Tower, Al Falah Street - Fatima bint Mubarak St 6, Abu Dhabi
default.title: Start Your Business
relatedJourneyDescription: The Manage Your Business journey contains a consolidated dashboard for business owners and representatives to view and respond to actions, apply for services, and view company level insights for a single or multiple businesses.
errorMessage.network: There was an issue loading the data. Please refresh the page.
errorMessage.noData.category: No activities are listed under this category.
errorMessage.selectActivity: Please select an activity to proceed
businessLicenseProcedure.main.title: Business Licence Procedure
businessLicenseProcedure.home.start.desc: Review the all licence information by clicking on start.
businessLicenseProcedure.home.descriptio: Through this Service, you will be able to know the requirments and costs of economic activites
businessLicenseProcedure.step1.title: Select Legal Form
businessLicenseProcedure.step1.title.des: Select legal form of the company/licence.
businessLicenseProcedure.step2.title: Select Activities
businessLicenseProcedure.step2.title.des: Search for activites by business categories or activity name and make a selection.
businessLicenseProcedure.step3.title: Review Licence Information
businessLicenseProcedure.step3.title.des: Review the licence summary, fee summary and requirements for your selections.
businessLicenseProcedure.step1.page.desc: Please select a legal form to continue.
businessLicenseProcedure.step2.page.desc: Search for activites by business categories or activity names and select the desired activity.
businessLicenseProcedure.step3.page.desc: Review the licence summary, fee summary and requirements for the selections previously made.
businessLicenseProcedure.errorText: An error occured while trying to complete your request. Please try again later.
applicant_age_constant: The applicant must be at least 21 years of age
